newsitem.title: USA: Dow pauses, drifts within range as techs dip.
newsitem.headline: Dow pauses, drifts within range as techs dip.

text.p: U.S. blue chip shares were slightly higher in afternoon trade on Thursday while technology stocks were mildly lower after yesterday's rally.
The Dow Jones Industrial average was up around 17 points at 8055, off session highs but out of negative territory as solid earnings reports curtailed a bout of profit-taking.
The Nasdaq composite, which also posted strong gains on Wednesday, was off around four points to 1576.
"Some consolidation at this level...is healthy," Peggy Farley, managing director of Amas Securities said.
The long bond rose 7/32 to a 6.46 percent yield.
